SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Interface Connection

All Known Implementing Classes:
Callback, ConnectionPlaceholder, SocketConnection
public interface Connection
The Connection interface represents a connection handler on the server side. It defines methods for sending messages, managing user information, accessing controllers, and closing the connection.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    close()
    Closes the connection.
    Controller
    getController()
    Returns the Controller instance associated with this connection.
    String
    getUsername()
    Returns the username associated with this connection.
    void
    send(Message m)
    Sends a message over the connection.
    void
    setUsername(String username)
    Sets the username associated with this connection.

  • Method Details

    • send

      void send(Message m)
      Sends a message over the connection.
      Parameters:
      m - the Message object to be sent

    • setUsername

      void setUsername(String username)
      Sets the username associated with this connection.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to set

    • getUsername

      String getUsername()
      Returns the username associated with this connection.
      Returns:
      the username

    • getController

      Controller getController()
      Returns the Controller instance associated with this connection.
      Returns:
      the Controller instance

    • close

      void close()
      Closes the connection. Implementations should release any resources associated with the connection.
